import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Input, Message, Checkbox } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import { network } from '../src/web3.js' import config from '../config.json' const CONFIG_FILE_PATH = './config.json' class Settings extends Component { state = { liquidatorAddress: config[network].liquidatorAddress, addressToLiquidate: config[network].addressToLiquidate, collateralAddress: config[network].collateralAddress, repayTokenAddress: config[network].repayTokenAddress, lpAddressProviderAddress: config[network].lpAddressProviderAddress, lpAddress: config[network].lpAddress, latestLpCoreAddress: config[network].latestLpCoreAddress, wss: config[network].wss, http: config[network].http, mnemonic: config[network].mnemonic, ethGasStationAPIKey: config[network].ethGasStationAPIKey, dynamicGasPrice: config[network].dynamicGasPrice, liquidationAmount: config[network].liquidationAmount, gasPrice: config[network].gasPrice, gasLimit: config[network].gasLimit, receiveATokens: config[network].receiveATokens, errorMessage: '', } onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) var file = new Blob([data], { type: type }) if (window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob) // IE10+ window.navigator.msSaveOrOpenBlob(file, filename) else { // Others var a = document.createElement('a'), url = URL.createObjectURL(file) a.href = url a.download = filename document.body.appendChild(a) a.click() setTimeout(function () { document.body.removeChild(a) window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url) }, 0) } } render() { return (

This is the Settings Screen

this.setState({ liquidatorAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ addressToLiquidate: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ collateralAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ repayTokenAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddressProviderAddress: event.target.value, }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ latestLpCoreAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ wss: event.target.value })} /> this.setState({ http: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ mnemonic: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ liquidationAmount: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasLimit: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ ethGasStationAPIKey: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasPrice: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState(({ dynamicGasPrice }) => ({ dynamicGasPrice: !dynamicGasPrice, })) } /> this.setState(({ receiveATokens }) => ({ receiveATokens: !receiveATokens, })) } />
) } } export default Settings
